description:
Sustainable Development (SD) appears as one of the greatest economic opportunities of the twenty-first century. It is important to know exactly what it is about and well control its different versions at the enterprise level, and more broadly of all organizations, through the concept of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR).
 
 

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1 - Issues
Sustainable development: what are we talking about?The transition from economic growth to sustainable developmentThe unprecedented challenges of sustainable developmentNatural capital and the economic policies of sustainable developmentCompanies - actresses sustainable developmentsocial responsibility of business tools
Week 2 - Origins to governance
The nature in the political economyNature and value of Marx to NeoclassicalWhat regulation for sustainable development?Contributions of ecological economicsComplexity and governance issues for sustainable developmentkey concepts for a Green Economy
Week 3 - Sustainable Development and Competitiveness
A typology of corporate strategies on sustainable developmentsustainable development and social responsibility of business - The main reasons for competitivenessSustainable development: a motor (eco) innovationThe different types of eco-innovationsThe competitive positions facing the emerging eco-innovationsThe social / societal entrepreneurship
Week 4 - The great contemporary issues of sustainable development
Technological risks to social responsibilityTechnological risks to social responsibilityEuropean policy for the circular economyThe socio-economic challenges of climate changeThe opportunities of the fight against climate changeSmart cities, sustainable development
Week 5 - Operational tools of the corporate social responsibility
Introduction to the fundamentals of corporate social responsibilityIs CSR mandatory for companies?Companies facing the corporate social responsibilityThe good practices of corporate social responsibility (for an ETI)The good practices of corporate social responsibility (case of SMEs)The good practices of corporate social responsibility (case of a large company)
Week 6 - The steps of the corporate social responsibility
Different types of approach to corporate social responsibilityThe drafting of the policy and diagnosis CSRDevelopment of CSR action planImplementation of CSR action planThe monitoring of the CSR and its improvementThe valuation of CSR actions implemented
title: Le développement durable, un levier de croissance
